attention1.ptxt: Before servicing fuel system, be sure to observe Precautions on Fuel System Service .

s1.ptxt: Relief fuel pressure referring to Fuel Pressure Relief Procedure .
Remove battery.
Drain engine oil referring to Engine Oil and Filter Change .
Drain coolant referring to Cooling System Draining .
Remove accessory drive belt referring to Accessory Drive Belt and Idler Pulley Removal and Installation .
Remove shift control lever referring to Transmission Shift Control Lever Removal and Installation .
Remove exhaust No.1 pipe referring to Exhaust System Components .
Remove front and rear propeller shafts referring to Propeller Shaft Removal and Installation .
Disconnect clutch operating cylinder referring to Clutch Fluid Pipe and Hose Removal and Installation .
With hose connected, detach A/C compressor from its bracket referring to Compressor Assembly Removal and Installation , if equipped.

attention2.ptxt: Suspend removed A/C compressor at a place where no damage will be caused during removal and installation of engine assembly.

s1.ptxt: Disconnect P/S suction hose and low pressure return hose from P/S fluid reservoir referring to P/S Hose / Pipe Components .
Disconnect MAF sensor connector (1), and remove air cleaner case (2) and turbocharger inlet hose (3).
Remove intercooler inlet pipe (1).
Disconnect the following connectors and wire harness.

item.ptxt: Diesel particulate filter differential pressure sensor (10)
Noise suppressor wire (14) from timing belt cover No.2

s1.ptxt: Remove relay box (1), fuse box No.1 (2) and boost pressure control solenoid valve (3) from vehicle body.
Disconnect the following hoses.

attention2.ptxt: After disconnecting, plug fuel line with plug cap immediately referring to Precautions on Fuel System Service .

item.ptxt: Radiator inlet hose No.1 (1) from radiator inlet pipe
Radiator outlet hoses No.1 (2) from radiator
Fuel feed hose (5) from fuel filter
Fuel return hose (6) from fuel return pipe

s1.ptxt: Support front suspension frame and engine rear mounting member using engine jack (2).
Carry out Step 1) through 12) of “Removal” under Front Suspension Frame, Stabilizer Bar and/or Bushings Removal and Installation in order to lower engine with front suspension frame.
Remove front suspension frame mounting bolts (1).
Remove engine rear mounting member bolts (1).
Before lowering engine with transmission and front suspension frame from engine compartment, recheck to make sure all hoses, electric wires and cables are disconnected.
Lower engine with transmission and front suspension frame from engine compartment.

attention2.ptxt: Before lowering engine, in order to avoid damage to A/C compressor, make clearance by rising them.

s1.ptxt: Disconnect transmission from engine referring to Manual Transmission Assembly Dismounting and Remounting , if necessary.

attention2.ptxt: Before starting engine (including when performing oil level check and air bleeding process of cooling system) for the first time after installing turbocharger, be sure to lubricate turbocharger, referring to “CAUTION” in “Installation” under Turbocharger Assembly Removal and Installation . Otherwise, lack of lubrication will cause turbocharger damage.

s1.ptxt: Connect transmission to engine referring to Manual Transmission Assembly Dismounting and Remounting , if removed.
Lift engine with transmission and front suspension frame to engine compartment using engine jack.

attention2.ptxt: Before lifting engine, in order to avoid damage to A/C compressor, make clearance by rising them.

s1.ptxt: Tighten engine rear mounting member bolt referring to Engine Mounting Components .
Carry out Step 5) through 19) of “Installation” under Front Suspension Frame, Stabilizer Bar and/or Bushings Removal and Installation in order to install engine with front suspension frame.
Remove engine jack.
Install relay box (1), fuse box No.1 (2) and boost pressure control solenoid valve (3) to vehicle body.
Connect connectors and wire harness disconnected in removal procedure.
Connect hoses disconnected in removal procedure.
Install intercooler inlet pipe (1).
Install air cleaner case (1) and turbocharger inlet hose (2), and connect MAF sensor connector (3).
Connect P/S suction hose and low pressure return hose referring to P/S Hose / Pipe Components .
Install A/C compressor to its bracket referring to Compressor Assembly Removal and Installation , if removed.
Install front and rear propeller shafts referring to Propeller Shaft Removal and Installation .
Install exhaust No.1 pipe referring to Exhaust System Components .
Install shift control lever referring to Transmission Shift Control Lever Removal and Installation .
Install accessory drive belt referring to Accessory Drive Belt and Idler Pulley Removal and Installation .
Check all removed parts are back in place.
Refill coolant referring to Cooling System Refilling .
Refill engine oil referring to Engine Oil and Filter Change .
After installation, bleed air from clutch system referring to Air Bleeding of Brake System for air bleeding procedure.
Install battery, and connect positive (+) and negative (–) cable at battery.
Bleed air in fuel system referring to Air Bleeding of Fuel System .
Start engine, and check coolant, oil and exhaust gas leakage at each connection.
Check fuel leakage referring to Fuel Leakage Check Procedure .
Check DTC referring to DTC Check .
